Production Co: Jouror Productions, Sirena Film, Fidélité Films, France 3 Cinéma, CN5 Productions, Gabriel inc., Scope Pictures
Rating: R (Brief Graphic Nudity|A Scene of Drug Use|Sexual Content)
Synopsis: In 1921 France, a wealthy woman (Catherine Frot) follows her passion to sing in front of audiences, but no one tells her how bad she is.
Title: Marguerite
